Business Details
Edit info for this business Hours: Not available Categories: Delicatessens, Fast Food Restaurants, Sandwich Shops , Caterers Payment: AMEX, DISCOVER, MASTER CARD, VISA General Info
McAlister's Deli is a chain of quick-service restaurants operated by McAlister's Corp. Located in Vestavia, Ala., the restaurant offers a wide variety of sandwiches, giant spuds, entree salads, soups and sweets. It also serves a feast of made-to-order choices, including box lunches, fruits, vegetables, sandwich trays, desserts, beverages and breakfast selections. The fast-food restaurant specializes in serving signature Famous Sweet Tea. McAlister's Deli uses Black Angus roast beef, Black Forest ham, caramelized onions, brie cheese and roasted corn.

4 stars
Traci L. 04/12/2006
MCALLISTARS
Provided by Judy's Book
I totally LOVE Mcallistars Deli. This deli is a chain but mostly in the SouthEast US. The food is great..I think a bit overpriced but good.I ususally do a 6 inch french dip with chips and drink and the cost is usally around $8.50 - $9.00.The food is always quick and very good.I eat here about twice a month.....good place to meet with friends and have a lunch get-together or dinner get-together.
